latex:
Let $ n$ be a positive integer such that $ \tfrac{1}{2}+\tfrac{1}{3}+\tfrac{1}{7}+\tfrac{1}{n}$ is an integer. Which of the following statements is \textbf{not} true?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 2\text{ divides }n \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 3\text{ divides }n \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 6\text{ divides }n \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 7\text{ divides }n \\
\textbf{(E)}\ n>84$
